Methods

AddDdap(IServiceCollection, Action<DdapOptions>)

Adds DDAP core services to the service collection.

public static IDdapBuilder AddDdap(this IServiceCollection services, Action<DdapOptions> configureOptions)

Parameters

services IServiceCollection

The service collection.

configureOptions Action<DdapOptions>

An action to configure DDAP options.

Returns

IDdapBuilder

A IDdapBuilder for chaining additional provider configurations.

Examples

services.AddDdap(options =>
{
    options.ConnectionString = "Server=localhost;Database=MyDb;";
    options.Provider = DatabaseProvider.SQLServer;
})
.AddRest()
.AddGrpc()
.AddGraphQL();
